_adaptation: Simplified race data for Arcane BFRPG dungeon crawler

Human.description: Versatile and ambitious, humans are the most adaptable of the common races

Dwarf.description: Bold and hardy, dwarves are known as skilled warriors, miners, and workers of stone

Elf.description: Elves are a magical people of otherworldly grace, living in harmony with nature

Halfling.description: The diminutive halflings survive in a world full of larger creatures by avoiding notice
